revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Date letter; review oral proofreading corrections
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p: i sat down and let every thing go to write this it seems so long since i have written to you well georgeyGeorgey came home on saturday Saturday and went back on sunday Sunday and matt and the children went back with him he insisted when he first came home on saturday Saturday on their going but i think he got rather sorry he did before they started i think he wished matt to go but the children was so noisey noisy he got sick of his bargain if i had felt well i wouldent wouldn't let them go i hope mattyMatty will like her) but its it's very evedent evident she will be boss georgeGeorge has spent 700 dollars for his house i think he will not add much to his bank book) i know waltWalt you will say mother is childish but waltWalt there is such a difference when he used to come home he would ask me if i wanted any thing when he went down town saturday Saturday but it was so different this time

when he was going away he asked me if i dident didn't want some money i said i would like to have a little as matt had used her money all the time she had been here he gave me six dollars) he makes 14 dollars and over per day) but waltWalt there is no knowing what or how a man may change when he gets married georgeGeorge is certainly the last one you would think as he always was set in his way) but as you say by my putting a bed in the front room wonders will never cease
i got your letter walterWalter dear and the money order was glad to have it dident didn't expect to get it till this week and hatt got her graphe she said aint ain't uncle waltWalt good) the children is very noisey noisy and wild but matt is so kind to me i put up with it all) when matt comes home she will give you a description i hope it will be favorable
